title: ‘Ride for Magnus’ Memorial Bike Ride Will Honor Magnus White and Serve as Rallying Call
content:
After the 17-year-old national champion was hit and killed by a driver in 2023, his family has become dedicated to advocating for safer roads.

Read the full article at ‘Ride for Magnus’ Memorial Bike Ride Will Honor Magnus White and Serve as Rallying Call on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
